channel.title: Item drops dissapear
channel.description: Okay so i went in my config.java and found admin_can_drop and its set to true, i go on as an admin kill an npc, and i get loot, then i go on my owner acc, kill npc, and it says item dissapears as it touches the ground, but in config.java there is no OWNER_CAN_DROP? What do i do, please help.. :(

item.title: Item drops dissapear
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

if (itemId >= 2412 && itemId <= 2414 || c.playerRights == 3) { c.sendMessage("The item vanishes as it touches the ground."); return; }

remove that

and next season.

Read full topic

item.title: Item drops dissapear
item.dc:creator: @Morgan_Linder Morgan Linder
item.description:
@Morgan_Linder wrote:

/**
* Creates the ground item
**/
public int[][] brokenBarrows = {{4708,4860},{4710,4866},{4712,4872},{4714,4878},{4716,4884},
{4720,4896},{4718,4890},{4722,4902},{4732,4932},{4734,4938},{4736,4944},{4738,4950},
{4724,4908},{4726,4914},{4728,4920},{4730,4926},{4745,4956},{4747,4962},{4749,4968},{4751,4974},
{4753,4980},{4755,4986},{4757,4992},{4759,4998}};
public void createGroundItem(Client c, int itemId, int itemX, int itemY, int itemAmount, int playerId) {
if(itemId > 0) {
if (itemId >= 2412 && itemId <= 2414 || c.playerRights == 3) {
c.sendMessage(“The item vanishes as it touches the ground.”);
return;
}
btw, when the hell is lebron gonna get a second ring like for real l0l
